import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { GLOBALTYPES } from '../../redux/actions/globalTypes' import { checkImage } from '../../utils/imgUpload' const CreatePost = () => { const { auth } = useSelector(state => state) const dispatch = useDispatch const initialState = { title: '', description: '', jobType: '', skillRequired: '', duration: '', salary: '', deadlines: '', maxApplicants: '', maxPositions: '', } const [postData, setPostData] = useState(initialState) const { title, description, jobType, skillRequired, duration, salary, deadline, maxApplicants, maxPositions } = postData const [images, setImages] = useState('') useEffect(() => { }, []) const handleChangeInput = e => { const {name, value} = e.target setPostData({...postData, [name]: value}) } const handleUpload = e => { const file = e.target.files[0] const err = checkImage(file) if(err) return dispatch({ type: GLOBALTYPES.ALERT, payload: {error: err} }) setImages(file) } const handleDestroy = e => { setImages('') } const styleUpload = { display: images ? "block" : "none" } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log(postData) } return (
